review: I freakin love this thing!  I don't have or want cable.  I was just looking for some this that let me watch netflix and hulu on our tv, while freeing up the iPad.  I got this on sale, lucky me.  I was surprised by how much I loved the amazon music feature.  I was plenty happy with pandora.  No more.  This has no adds and tons of free music.  I love the prime playlists...they are so good, it feels like people created...not just an algorithm.  I was determined to drop Prime after the free trial, but honestly, they got me.  It is an incredible value for all it gives you with programming, shipping rates, ect. Very happy customer.
author: Kathryn Hack
